StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_dbaCountShipperRecruitEntries]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ssn varchar(9), @cse_date date.me AS
declare @nwa_id int
set @nwa_id= (select nwa_id from candidate_status where nwa_id in ( select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id=(select person_id from person where social_Security_number=@ssn) ) and status_code='C' and disposi.on_code='N' )
if @@rowcount=0 Print 'No entries exist for the SSN: ' + @ssn
insert into tblShipperFailureTemp select @ssn as SSN,count(*) as CNEntryCount,@nwa_id as NWA_ID,@cse_date as CSE_DATE from candidate_status where nwa_id in ( select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id=(select person_id from person where social_Security_number=@ssn) ) and status_code='C' and disposi.on_code='N'
if @@rowcount=0 Print 'No entries exist for the SSN: ' + @ssn
